p.e:
WELCOME TO DOOGY'S FURNITURE STORE!

If you are a Creator/Editor, feel free to donate your
items here for others to peruse and copy for themselves.
Assign them in the appropriate section and create a
non-copiable info card for each one, displaying its
name and the name of its original creator.

This area is still a work in progress and it will grow
as the game and its community grows.

Thank you for visiting!
- Doogy
